snippet.title: Kaze and the Wild Masks | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Subscribe to keep up to date: https://www.youtube.com/user/SOEDESCO?sub_confirmation=1
Join the conversation: https://discord.gg/soedesco
Visit the Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/829280/YT

About Kaze and the Wild Masks: 
Relive your childhood memories in this 90’s classics inspired platformer. Play as Kaze and invoke the powers of the Wild Masks to master land, sky and sea. Pounce ferociously like a tiger, rule the sea like a shark and discover more magical skills to save your friends.  

Features
Use the Wild Masks to pounce like a tiger, soar through the sky like an eagle, speed like a lizard and rule the sea like a  shark
Uncover the world’s secrets through collectables, achievements, bonus levels and more
Take on tough challenges in a combination with simple and intuitive mechanics
Enjoy playing a true 90’s classics inspired platformer in modern pixel-art graphics

Follow SOEDESCO®!
Website: http://www.soedesco.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Soedesco
Twitter: https://twitter.com/soedesco
Instagram: https://instagram.com/soedesco
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/soedesco

#SOEDESCO #KazeAndTheWildMasks
